ingredients: 2 cloves roasted garlic
3 tablespoons freshly chopped parsley
2 tablespoons freshly chopped oregano
⅓ cup Colavita Extra Virgin Olive Oil
2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice
1 tsp smoked paprika
¼ teaspoon salt
a few grinds of black pepper
4 skin-on, bone-in chicken thighs
¼ thick cut pancetta, roughly chopped
2 tablespoons chopped preserved lemons (optional)
1 tablespoon Colavita Extra Virgin Olive Oil
¼ cup Colavita Pinot Grigio
½ cup Rachael Ray Low Sodium Chicken Stock
½ cup Cirio Crushed Tomatoes
½ cup Bella di Cerignola Olives (or similar green olives, pits removed)
lemon zest, more fresh parsley and oregano, dusting of smoked paprika, freshly ground black pepper.
